data.title: Newark Liberty International Airport Information Guide
data.meta_description: Know all about Newark Liberty International Airport before you start your journey from here. For cheap deals on ticket bookings, you can visit Tripbeam.com.
data.text:
Newark Liberty International Airport is the primary serving airport for the New York metropolitan and the Northern New Jersey area.

The cities of Newark and Elizabeth own it jointly. Also, it was initially known as Newark Metropolitan Airport.

You can easily find the airlines offering the lowest airfare to India that fly from this airport. Also, Newark Liberty International Airport was the first major airport in the USA.

In terms of the flights, it was the busiest airport in the year 2013. This was for the New York-New Jersey metropolitan area.

Further, it handles millions of passengers each year. It supports over 50 carriers. Also, it is one of the main hubs for United Airlines.

Thus, you are sure to find cheap airways from the USA to India from this airport.

Here is everything a passenger boarding a flight from Newark Liberty International Airport must know about it.

Terminals at Newark Liberty International Airport

This international airport has three passenger terminals, namely:

Terminal A – with 29 Gates

This terminal at the Newark Liberty International Airport has a total of four levels. Also, its completion was done in the year 1973. The terminal also has a baggage carousel.

You can find it on its 2nd floor. Further, the ramp operations and the short-term parking area on the ground floor.

Further, those who need to fly to India need not come to this terminal. This is because this terminal is basically for all domestic and Canadian flights.

Further, the airline that serves these includes – Jet Blue, Alaska Airlines, Air Canada Express, Air Canada, Southwest, Virgin America, United Express, and American Airlines.

Besides this, this Newark Liberty International Airport terminal has three concourses.

These are – A1, A2, and A3. Further, this is the only terminal here without immigration facilities.

Therefore, no international flights land here. However, some of the international flights departing from this airport can use Terminal A.

Terminal B – with 24 Gates

This terminal of the airport has four levels, just like Terminal A. you can find the gates of this Newark Liberty International Airport terminal on the 3rd floor.

Also, the shops are on the same floor too. The baggage carousel is on the 2nd floor. Moreover, this terminal has an international arrivals lounge on this floor, as well.

This terminal also handles the operations of foreign carriers along with flights to the Caribbean.

Also, it is through Delta Airlines, JetBlue, Elite Airways, Spirit Airlines, and United Airlines international flights. Thus, if you have a flight to Ahmedabad, India from here, make sure to access this lounge.

Terminal C – with 68 Gates

This Newark Liberty International Airport terminal has two ticketing levels. One of these is for domestic check-in and another for international.

Also, you can find food and shopping outlets here on a mezzanine-level. This is between the two check-in floors.

Further, this terminal is typically for United Airlines. Also, the regional carrier of this airline – United Express can use it. Thus, if you have a flight to India with this airline, you must know about this terminal.

Hotels at Newark Liberty International Airport

When you have airline tickets to India and have to catch a flight from this airport, you can find numerous hotels for your stay before that here. These include:

Newark Liberty International Airport Marriott

If you have cheap India tickets, you can choose this hotel for your visit. You can find it on the Newark Liberty International Airport ground. Also, you get a free shuttle for all the terminals.

Best Western Plus Newark Airport West

This hotel is also an excellent choice for you. It is just 3 minutes away from this airport. Further, you can enjoy a 24-hour free airport shuttle service, as well.

Holiday Inn Newark Airport

Just like the above choice, this, too, offers its customers a free 24-hour airport shuttle service.

Further, this also is only 3 minutes away from Newark Liberty International airport. Thus, you can catch your New York to Mumbai flight in time.

Wyndham Garden Newark Airport

This hotel is an amazing one, as well. It is just 2 minutes away from this airport. And there is a free 24-hour airport shuttle service too.

Hilton Newark Airport

You can find it at a distance of 6 minutes from Newark Liberty International airport. And just like the hotels above, it also supports free airport shuttle service.

Lounges at Newark Liberty International Airport

When you book flights to the USA from cheap flight booking sites in India, you can access many lounges once you reach the Newark Liberty International Airport. These lounges include:

Art & Lounge

United Club

Air Canada Maple Leaf Lounge

American Airlines Admirals Club, Newark

Delta Sky Club

Military Lounge

Thus, once you and here, you can easily use them if you are traveling with certain airlines.

Facilities at Newark Liberty International Airport

Apart from everything given above, the airport offers many facilities as well. These are:

Transportation

You can easily avail of transportation facilities at Newark Liberty International Airport. These include road, air train, and bus services.

Thus, when you buy tickets to India, you can easily reach the airport. Also, you can use this to travel between the terminals.

ATMs

Newark Liberty International Airport has ATMs and cash machines. These are available both airside and landside.

Wi-Fi

You can even enjoy free Wi-Fi here. However, it is for 30 minutes only.

Currency Exchange

After booking a ticket in India, when you reach Newark Liberty International Airport, you can easily exchange foreign currency.

Nursing Rooms

Further, there is the facility of nursing rooms at terminal B.

Duty-Free Shops

For your shopping, Newark Liberty International Airport has numerous duty-free shops, as well. Also, you can find these at all the terminals.

Food and Drinks

There are several dining options here. Further, these also include famous food outlets like Subway and Dunkin Donuts.

Pet Relief Area

Also, you can find pet relief areas at all the terminals of Newark Liberty International Airport. Thus, you can easily travel with your pets.

The airport is ideal for starting your journey. Not only will you avail of many cheap flights from the USA to India but you can also enjoy many facilities here.
